使用ggplot2绘制双折线图

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
#加载包
# install.packages('ggplot2')
library(ggplot2)#绘图工具

#读入数据
data <- read.table('C:/Users/86132/Downloads/outFileBC_1CNN_relu.txt', sep = '\t')
x <- seq(from=0, to=49);x #设置横坐标
```
## R Markdown

This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see <http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com>.

When you click the **Knit** button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document. You can embed an R code chunk like this:

```{r cars}
ggplot()+
  geom_line(data = data,aes(x = x ,y = V3,colour = "Train_acc"),size=1)+
  geom_point(data = data,aes(x = x,y=V3,colour = "Train_acc"),size=3)+
  geom_line(data = data,aes(x=x,y = V5,colour ="Test_acc"),size=1) + 
  geom_point(data = data,aes(x=x,y = V5,colour = "Test_acc"),size=3)+
  scale_colour_manual("",values = c("Train_acc" = "red", "Test_acc" = "blue"))+
  xlab("xlab")+ylab("acc")+
  theme_bw() + #去掉背景灰色
  theme(
        # panel.grid.major=element_line(colour=NA),
        # panel.background = element_rect(fill = "transparent",colour = NA),
        # plot.background = element_rect(fill = "transparent",colour = NA),
        # panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),#以上theme中代码用于去除网格线且保留坐标轴边框
        text=element_text(size=13)
        )
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
